scripts.js: uglifyjs app/app.js app/panistfacets/PanistfacetsDirective.js app/panistfacets/PanistfacetsCtrl.js app/panistfacets/PanistfacetsService.js app/panistsearch/PanistsearchDirective.js app/panistsearch/PanistsearchCtrl.js app/panistsearch/PanistsearchService.js app/panistselect2/Panistselect2Directive.js app/panistselect2/Panistselect2Ctrl.js app/panistselect2/Panistselect2Service.js app/panistresults/PanistresultsDirective.js app/panistresults/PanistresultsCtrl.js app/panistresults/PanistresultsService.js app/panistconfigdefault.js -o public/src/js/app.min.js -cE
scripts.jscss: npm run js && npm run css
scripts.prepublish: npm run js && npm run css && bower install
